name: 何震寰
objective: 本課程研究形態生成理論以及實務演練其程序，以做為一種設計思考的新模式。課程中將進行設計形體的生長、變化、回應、演化、調適，並以此方法重新檢視建築空間設計之幾何向度，提升設計方案之競爭力。
schedule:
w1 8hr Grasshopper Tutorial
w2 8hr Grasshopper Tutorial by students
w3 Grasshopper & Rhino Script Case Study
w4 Grasshopper & Rhino Script Case Study
w5 Natural Subject Selected for Research
w6-9 Tutorial: Morphogenetic Definition Development Ⅰ
w10 3d Printing
w11-16 Tutorial: Morphogenetic Definition Development Ⅱ
w17 3d Printing
w18 Documentation & Exhibition
scorePolicy:
40% 出席及課堂表現 
60% 作業及成果
materials:
Michael Hensel, Achim Menges, Michael Weinstock,  Emergence: Morphogenetic Design Strategies (Architectural Design), 2004
Hensel, Michael, Menges, Achim, Morpho-ecologies, Architectural Association , 2006 
Michael Hensel, Achim Menges, Michael Weinstock, Techniques and Technologies in Morphogenetic Design (Architectural Design) , 2006
Michael Hensel, Achim Menges,  Versatility and Vicissitude: Performance in Morpho-Ecological Design (Architectural Design), 2008
Hensel , Michael, Menges , Achim, Hight , Christopher, Space reader : heterogeneous space in architecture, Wiley 2009. 
Achim Menges and Sean Ahlquist, Computational Design Thinking, Wiley, 2011
Mark Garcia, The Diagrams of Architecture: AD Reader , 2010
